title: Until Susan
description: Inspired by, and based in, the love-filled universe, created by NYT and USA Today bestselling author, Aurora Rose Reynolds, in her series, Until, Until Her, and Until Him -- see how the Mayson clan began, in this first story in the Happily Ever Alpha World.You've read their sons' stories...Now it's James and Susan's turn. Experience the BOOM! all over again in this action-packed novella of insta-love and suspense brought to you from author C.P. Smith!
author: C.P.  Smith
